summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Atlantic Street, from Forty-fourth Avenue Southwest to Forty-fifth Avenue Southwest, West Seattle Street, from California Avenue to Forty-fourth Avenue Southwest; Sunset Avenue, from Forty-sixth Avenue Southwest to Forty-fourth Avenue Southwest; Forty-fourth Avenue Southwest from West Wait Street to West Atlantic Street; Forty-fifth Avenue Southwest, from West Wait Street to Sunset Avenue, California Avenue from West Lander Street to West Seattle Street; and Ferry Avenue from California Avenue to Forty-sixth Avenue Southwest; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of the proper dimensions and materials together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, and including as a part of said improvement the construction of a temporary outfall extending from Forty-fifth Avenue Southwest and Sunset Avenue Northwesterly to Alki Avenue and Jersey Street, thence Northwesterly on Jersey Street and Jersey Street produced to deep water, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4010 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
